description:
Smooth, yet grippy. When transitioning from the drop, the Vex’s lightly textured surface lets your hands glide into position, then gives you that confidence inspiring “locked in” feeling as soon as you apply a little squeeze.

  • Light texture feels like other high-end road grips, at a fraction of the price
  • 3mm-thick tape with a gel layer absorbs and dampens road vibration
  • Expanding bar end plugs included
name: MEC Vex Handlebar Tape
